column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The service deserves a better rating
column2: but I can't get over my disappointment with the food. My server was pretty damn good. Save the end of the meal where he was a bit too insistent on our purchasing dessert. He coursed our meal exactly the right way even though we didn't tell him anything when we placed our orders. Also
column3: the mini-churros were awesome. The bussers were great with refilling our water. The food runner
column5: was very unclear with announcing our dishes
column6: and kind of threw them onto our table.
